pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - SkylineRealty SkylineRealty Home Service About Order Terms and Conditions Agreement to Terms: By accessing or using SkylineRealty's website or services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as any additional terms and policies referenced herein. If you do not agree to these Terms and Conditions, you may not use our website or services. These Terms and Conditions apply to all users, including but not limited to visitors, customers, and clients. SkylineRealty reserves the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review these Terms and Conditions periodically for changes. Continued use of our website or services after the posting of changes constitutes acceptance of those changes. If you do not agree to the modified Terms and Conditions, you must stop using our website and services immediately. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of SkylineRealty's website and services and supersede any prior agreements or understandings between you and SkylineRealty. Use of Website: You may use SkylineRealty's website and services for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these Terms and Conditions. You agree not to use our website or services in any way that violates applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: engaging in illegal or fraudulent activities, infringing on intellectual property rights, transmitting viruses or malware, or interfering with the functioning of our website or services. You are solely responsible for any content you post, submit, or transmit on or through our website or services. SkylineRealty does not endorse or control user-generated content and shall not be liable for any such content. We reserve the right to remove or disable access to any content that violates these Terms and Conditions or is otherwise objectionable, without prior notice. Intellectual Property Rights: SkylineRealty's website and services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, display, or transmit any content from our website or services without prior written consent from SkylineRealty. You may not use SkylineRealty's name, logo, or trademarks in any manner that could cause confusion or imply endorsement without our express permission. Any unauthorized use of our intellectual property rights is strictly prohibited and may result in legal action. Privacy Policy: By using SkylineRealty's website or services, you consent to the collection, processing, and storage of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information and your rights regarding your data. We take your privacy seriously and implement appropriate measures to safeguard your personal information in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. You can review our Privacy Policy for more information on how we handle your personal data and your rights as a user. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us for assistance. User Accounts: Some features of SkylineRealty's website or services may require you to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating your account and to update your information promptly if it changes. You may not share your account credentials with others or allow unauthorized access to your account. SkylineRealty reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if we suspect unauthorized use or violation of these Terms and Conditions. Limitation of Liability: SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, goodwill, or data, arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services. This limitation of liability applies whether the alleged liability is based on contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, or any other legal theory, even if SkylineRealty has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In jurisdictions that do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages, SkylineRealty's liability is limited to the greatest extent permitted by law. SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any delay or failure to perform its obligations under these Terms and Conditions due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, natural disasters, or government actions. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless SkylineRealty, its affiliates, agents, employees, and licensors from any claims, losses, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses arising out of or in connection with your use of our website or services. Governing Law: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where SkylineRealty is located, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in the jurisdiction where SkylineRealty is located. If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. The failure of SkylineRealty to enforce any right or provision of these Terms and Conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and SkylineRealty regarding your use of our website and services, superseding any prior agreements or understandings SkylineRealty@gmail.com. Dispute Resolution: Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of or relating to these Terms and Conditions, or the breach, termination, or invalidity thereof, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the rules of the arbitration institution designated by SkylineRealty. The arbitration shall be conducted in the English language and held in the jurisdiction where SkylineRealty is located. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding upon both parties, and judgment upon the arbitration award may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. Each party shall bear its own costs and expenses of arbitration, including legal fees and expenses. Nothing in this section shall prevent either party from seeking injunctive or other equitable relief from a court of competent jurisdiction. Amendments: SkylineRealty reserves the right to amend or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Any amendments or modifications to these Terms and Conditions will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. pages.about: Learn More About SkylineRealty: Our Story and Mission SkylineRealty Home Service About Order GET TO KNOWABOUT  US Discover Our Story Learn more about who we are, our mission, and our commitment to providing exceptional real estate services. Explore our journey, values, and dedication to helping you achieve your property goals. Learn More Our Story Exclusive PortfolioSkylineRealty At Skyline Realty, our journey began with a simple yet profound vision: to redefine the real estate experience. Founded on principles of integrity, expertise, and client-centric service, we set out to create a brokerage that prioritizes the needs and aspirations of our clients above all else. From our humble beginnings to becoming a trusted name in the industry, our commitment to excellence has remained unwavering. We believe that buying or selling a home is more than just a transaction—it's a significant milestone in people's lives. That's why we approach every interaction with care, dedication, and a relentless pursuit of perfection. With a team of seasoned professionals and a portfolio of exceptional properties, we strive to exceed expectations and set new standards of quality and service. Whether you're searching for your dream home or seeking to maximize the value of your investment, we're here to guide you every step of the way. Join us on this journey as we continue to innovate, inspire, and elevate the real estate experience for our clients and communities. Welcome to Skyline Realty—where your vision meets our expertise, and together, we turn dreams into reality. Satisfied Clients Over 1000 clients served Global Reach Transactions in 15 countries Customer Satisfaction 98% satisfaction rate Efficiency Average time on market: 30 days our Values Guiding Principles for Excellence At Skyline Realty, our values serve as the cornerstone of our operations. We are committed to integrity, transparency, and professionalism in every interaction. With a focus on client satisfaction, innovation, and community engagement, we strive to uphold these principles in all that we do. Integrity We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and fairness, ensuring trust and confidence in all our relationships. Client-Centric Approach Putting our clients' needs first is at the heart of everything we do, providing personalized service and tailored solutions. Continuous Innovation We embrace change and actively seek out new ideas and technologies to enhance our services and exceed expectations. Community Engagement We are committed to giving back to the communities we serve, supporting local initiatives and fostering positive social impact. who we are meet our Team At Skyline Realty, we are more than just a real estate agency—we are a team of dedicated professionals united by a passion for excellence and a commitment to our clients. Our diverse team brings together expertise from various backgrounds, allowing us to provide comprehensive and personalized service to meet your unique needs. Get to know the faces behind our success and discover the expertise, dedication, and professionalism that define us. John Smith Real Estate Agent Emily Johnson Property Manager Michael Williams Investment Advisor our news Explore the latest developments, announcements, and insights from Skyline Realty. From market trends to community events, our news div keeps you informed and engaged with all that's happening in the world of real estate. pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - SkylineRealty SkylineRealty Home Service About Order Disclaimer Accuracy of Information: While SkylineRealty strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on our website. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. We recommend that you verify the accuracy of any information before acting upon it. SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any loss or damage arising from reliance on information provided on our website, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages. We reserve the right to modify or remove any content on our website without prior notice. We do not guarantee the availability of specific properties or services listed on our website. Users are advised to seek professional advice or conduct their own research before making any decisions based on information obtained from SkylineRealty's website. Property Listings: Property listings on SkylineRealty's website are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute an offer to sell or lease any property. While we endeavor to keep property listings accurate and current, availability, pricing, and other details may change without notice. Users should independently verify the accuracy and completeness of property listings and conduct their own due diligence before entering into any transaction or agreement. SkylineRealty shall not be responsible for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in property listings, nor for any losses or damages resulting from reliance on such information. Users are encouraged to contact us directly for the most up-to-date information on available properties and services. Professional Advice: Information provided on SkylineRealty's website is not intended to constitute legal, financial, or real estate advice. Users should consult with qualified professionals, such as attorneys, accountants, or real estate agents, for specific advice tailored to their individual circumstances. SkylineRealty does not endorse or recommend any specific properties, products, services, or professionals mentioned on our website. Any views or opinions expressed on our website are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of SkylineRealty. Users should exercise caution and discretion when relying on information obtained from our website and seek independent advice where necessary. Third-Party Content: SkylineRealty's website may contain links to third-party websites, advertisements, or sponsored content for informational purposes. We do not endorse or control the content, products, or services offered by third parties, and we are not responsible for the accuracy or availability of such content. Users access third-party content at their own risk and should review the terms of use and privacy policies of those websites before engaging with them. SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any losses or damages arising from reliance on third-party content or transactions with third-party providers. Users should exercise caution and conduct their own research when interacting with third-party websites or services. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall SkylineRealty or its affiliates, agents, employees, or licensors be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of our website or services. This limitation of liability applies whether the alleged liability is based on contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, or any other legal theory, even if SkylineRealty has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages, so the above limitation may not apply to you. In such jurisdictions, SkylineRealty's liability is limited to the greatest extent permitted by law. Property Descriptions: Property descriptions provided on SkylineRealty's website are for informational purposes only and may not accurately reflect the current condition or features of the property. Users should visit properties in person and conduct thorough inspections before making purchasing or leasing decisions. SkylineRealty does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of property descriptions and shall not be liable for any inaccuracies or omissions. Users should rely on their own judgment and the advice of qualified professionals when evaluating properties listed on our website. Any discrepancies between property descriptions and actual conditions should be brought to our attention for clarification and correction. Investment Risks: Real estate investments involve inherent risks, including but not limited to market fluctuations, economic downturns, and property value depreciation. Past performance of real estate investments is not indicative of future results, and there is no guarantee of profitability or return on investment. SkylineRealty does not provide investment advice and recommends that users consult with financial advisors or investment professionals before making real estate investment decisions. Users should carefully consider their financial situation, investment objectives, and risk tolerance before investing in real estate. SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any losses or damages resulting from real estate investment decisions made based on information obtained from our website. Property Inspections: SkylineRealty recommends that users conduct thorough property inspections before purchasing or leasing any property. Inspections may reveal defects, structural issues, or other problems that could affect the value or suitability of the property. Users should hire qualified inspectors to assess the condition of properties and provide detailed reports on any findings. SkylineRealty does not perform property inspections and shall not be liable for any defects or issues discovered after a property is purchased or leased. Users are responsible for conducting their own due diligence and should not rely solely on information provided by SkylineRealty. SkylineRealty@gmail.com. Lease Agreements: Lease agreements for rental properties listed on SkylineRealty's website are between the property owner and the tenant. SkylineRealty acts solely as a facilitator in connecting landlords with potential tenants and does not become a party to lease agreements. Users should review lease agreements carefully and seek legal advice if needed before signing any contracts. SkylineRealty does not guarantee the terms or conditions of lease agreements and shall not be liable for any disputes or issues arising between landlords and tenants. Users should understand their rights and obligations as landlords or tenants under applicable landlord-tenant laws and regulations. Property Taxes: Users should be aware of property tax obligations associated with owning or leasing real estate. Property tax rates and assessment methods vary by jurisdiction and may change over time. SkylineRealty does not provide tax advice and recommends that users consult with tax professionals or assessors regarding property tax matters. Users are responsible for paying property taxes on properties they own or occupy, and failure to do so may result in penalties or legal consequences. SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any tax-related issues or liabilities arising from users' ownership or occupation of properties listed on our website. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - SkylineRealty SkylineRealty Home Service About Order Privacy Policy Information Collection: SkylineRealty collects personal information from users when they visit our website, fill out forms, or interact with our services. This may include names, contact information, and property preferences. We may also gather non-personal information such as browser type, operating system, and IP address for analytics and optimization purposes. Information Use: Personal information collected by SkylineRealty is used to personalize user experience, improve customer service, and process transactions. We may use collected information to send periodic emails or newsletters containing company news, updates, or related product or service information. Non-personal information gathered may be used for website optimization, analytics, and marketing purposes. Data Protection: SkylineRealty employs industry-standard security measures to protect users' personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use secure socket layer (SSL) encryption to safeguard sensitive data transmitted over the internet during online transactions. Access to users' personal information is restricted to authorized personnel who require the information to perform their duties. Despite our best efforts, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and SkylineRealty cannot guarantee absolute security of users' information. In the event of a data breach, affected users will be notified promptly in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. Cookies: SkylineRealty uses cookies to enhance user experience and track website usage patterns. Cookies are small text files stored on users' devices that collect information such as preferences, browsing history, and session data. Users may choose to set their web browser to refuse cookies or alert them when cookies are being sent, but this may affect the functionality of certain parts of the website. Third-party service providers, such as Google Analytics, may also use cookies to track and analyze website traffic and usage. By continuing to use our website, users consent to the use of cookies as described in our privacy policy. Third-Party Links: SkylineRealty's website may contain links to third-party websites or services for users' convenience and information. These third-party sites have their own privacy policies and terms of use, which users should review before providing any personal information or engaging with their services. SkylineRealty does not endorse or assume any responsibility for the content, privacy practices, or policies of third-party websites or services. Users acknowledge and agree that their interactions with third-party sites are solely at their own risk, and SkylineRealty shall not be liable for any damages or losses arising from such interactions. This privacy policy applies solely to information collected by SkylineRealty's website and services. User Rights: Users have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of their personal information held by SkylineRealty. Requests for data access, correction, or deletion should be submitted in writing to our designated privacy officer. SkylineRealty will respond to user requests within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable data protection laws. In certain circumstances, users may also have the right to restrict the processing of their personal information or to object to its processing. SkylineRealty is committed to respecting users' rights and ensuring compliance with data protection regulations. Children's Privacy: SkylineRealty's website and services are not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18 without parental consent. If we become aware that a child under 18 has provided us with personal information without parental consent, we will take steps to delete such information from our records. Parents or legal guardians who believe that their child has provided personal information to SkylineRealty without their consent can contact us to request its removal. SkylineRealty encourages parents to monitor their children's online activities and to discuss privacy and security practices with them. Data Retention: SkylineRealty retains users' personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless a longer retention period is required by law. We may retain certain information for accounting, legal, or regulatory compliance purposes, even after it is no longer needed for its original purpose. Users' personal information will be securely disposed of when no longer required, in accordance with our data retention and disposal policies. Users can request the deletion of their personal information from our records at any time, subject to certain legal obligations or legitimate business interests. SkylineRealty takes reasonable measures to ensure that outdated or unnecessary information is promptly deleted or anonymized. SkylineRealty@gmail.com. International Data Transfers: SkylineRealty may transfer users' personal information to countries outside of their country of residence for processing or storage. These international data transfers may be necessary for the performance of a contract, provision of services, or other legitimate business purposes. When transferring personal information internationally, SkylineRealty takes steps to ensure adequate data protection and compliance with applicable data protection laws. Users' consent to the transfer of their personal information to countries outside their country of residence, including countries with different data protection laws. Changes to Privacy Policy: SkylineRealty reserves the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time without prior notice. Any changes to the privacy policy will be reflected on this page, and users are encouraged to review it periodically for updates. Continued use of SkylineRealty's website or services after the posting of changes to the privacy policy constitutes acceptance of those changes. If significant changes are made to the privacy policy, users will be notified via email or prominent notice on our website. By using SkylineRealty's website or services, users agree to be bound by the most current version of the privacy policy. Data Controller: SkylineRealty is the data controller responsible for the collection, processing, and storage of users' personal information. Our contact details are provided on the website, and users can reach out to us with any questions, concerns, or requests regarding their personal data. SkylineRealty is committed to ensuring the privacy and security of users' personal information in accordance with applicable data protection laws and regulations. Data Processor: In certain instances, SkylineRealty may engage third-party service providers to process users' personal information on our behalf. These third-party processors are contractually obligated to handle users' personal information securely and in accordance with our instructions and privacy policies. SkylineRealty conducts due diligence and implements appropriate safeguards to ensure that third-party processors meet the necessary data protection standards. Users' personal information may be transferred to, stored in, or processed by third-party processors located in jurisdictions outside their country of residence. User Consent: By using SkylineRealty's website or services, users consent to the collection, processing, and storage of their personal information as described in this privacy policy. Users also consent to the use of cookies and similar technologies for website optimization and analytics purposes. Consent may be withdrawn at any time by contacting us or adjusting browser settings to refuse cookies, but this may affect the functionality of certain website features. SkylineRealty relies on user consent as the legal basis for processing personal information, where applicable, and respects users' preferences regarding data collection and use. SkylineRealty@gmail.com. Contact Information: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or the handling of your personal information by SkylineRealty, please contact us. Our privacy officer can be reached by email, phone, or mail, using the contact details provided on our website. We are committed to addressing user inquiries promptly and resolving any issues or complaints regarding privacy and data protection. SkylineRealty values user feedback and strives to maintain transparency and accountability in our privacy practices. Thank you for entrusting us with your personal information. We appreciate your trust and confidence in SkylineRealty. Home Service About Order Policy Privacy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer © 2024 SkylineRealty. All rights reserved.

Sophia Brown Client "Skyline Realty turned our real estate dreams into reality. Their team was incredibly supportive and knowledgeable throughout our journey." Get the answers you Need Expert Guidance at Your Fingertips How do I start the home buying process? To begin the home buying process, it's essential to assess your budget, obtain mortgage pre-approval, and enlist the services of a trusted real estate agent. They will guide you through property searches, negotiations, and closing procedures. What factors should I consider when selling my home? When selling your home, factors such as market conditions, pricing strategy, property presentation, and timing are crucial. Working with a skilled real estate agent can help you navigate these considerations and maximize your selling potential. What are the benefits of investing in real estate? Real estate investment offers several advantages, including potential for long-term appreciation, passive income generation through rental properties, portfolio diversification, and tax benefits such as depreciation deductions. How can I determine the value of my property? Property valuation involves assessing factors such as location, size, condition, recent sales data, and market trends. Real estate agents and professional appraisers can provide accurate valuations based on comprehensive analyses of these factors. What should I look for in a rental property? When considering rental properties, factors to evaluate include location, rental demand, property condition, potential rental income, vacancy rates, landlord-tenant laws, and maintenance responsibilities. Conducting thorough research and due diligence is key to making informed investment decisions. Home Service About Order Policy Privacy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer © 2024 SkylineRealty. All rights reserved.
